channel.title: Foundations/walls etc Whit internal Power cable
channel.description:
Has anyone else had an idea about foundations that had internal Power lines build into.
I have been founding myself thinking about something like this:
Foundation 8X4, with direct power line: cost 6 concrete and 1 cable. Foundation 8x4, with crossed power line: cost 6 concrete and 2 cable. Foundation 8x4, cable outlet Up, which you can use, for example, as a source for a normal electrical pole
this could be used in walls etc.
If there is already Mod like this out, i would love to get a link for it.
thanks in advance, best regards Satisfactory novice engineer Stonevall
